```{r setup, echo = FALSE}
options(EBImage.display = "raster")
```

```{r read}
library("EBImage")
library("MSMB")
imagefile = system.file("images", "mosquito.png", package = "MSMB")
imagefile
mosq = readImage(imagefile)
```

To run this in RStudio, use ``command-enter`` to step through the lines.
In the RStudio Preferences, select the Rmarkdown tab and uncheck: "Show output inline for all R Markdown Documents".

```{r demo}
m = 1 - mosq
display(m)

m = mosq * 3
display(m)

m = mosq ^ (1/3)
display(m)

m   = mosq[100:438, 112:550]
display(m)

m = mosq > 0.5
display(m)

m = transpose(mosq)
display(m)

m = EBImage::rotate(mosq, angle = 30)
display(m)

m = translate(mosq, v = c(40, 70))
display(m)

m  = flip(mosq)
display(m)

m  = flop(mosq)
display(m)
```
